reviews.title: Great Slim Pants
reviews.review_text: These pants are my favorite. Very nice slim fit, and just as tough as the original 874s. They aren't slim like a skinny pant, but they are a tad bit slimmer than the classic 874, giving a nice slim look to the legs and seat. I would recommend sizing up though, the pant has a very small/short rise, and it could feel tight I. The groin if you are bigger or heavier. If very slim or skinny, you're good with regular size. I'm heavy, so I ordered a 36, instead of my usual 34, and they fit just right. Awesome pants. I do wish and hope that Dickies could add more colors to the 873 Slim line.

reviews.title: Solid, substantial and a little stylish
reviews.review_text: Solid, substantial and a little stylish trousers with slimmer legs for work. I buy these every year for my son who works at a hospital and needs sturdy pants with lots of pockets and many heavy-duty belt loops to support a belt laden with toggles and key rings. They keep a nice crease when ironed and stay black after daily wear and washing. My only wish is to have them offered in 29” inseam.

reviews.title: Everything I wear is Dickies.
reviews.review_text: Fit is perfect, waist and length. Like always Dickies run way slimmer in the waist so size up. I normally wear 34w so go to 36w when purchasing Dickies pants. 30L stops at the top of my shoes like I want in a pant. I like just a little more slimmer leg. Skateboarding pants straight fit are perfect pants.

reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
reviews.review_text: Ordered two pairs and they were both sized the same - honestly this is an improvement over past orders where some pants of the same size and cut were noticeably different. Good job. Color and shape has held up after a couple washings. I may go for a slightly lighter/softer fabric next time as these are pretty warm and I spend most of my time in an office.

reviews.title: Waist sizes.
reviews.review_text: The waist sizes do vary. I ordered a few different pairs and some were perfect fit and some much tighter.

reviews.title: Size difference
reviews.review_text: My husband swears by Dickies pants, he has worn them for 40 years. The Originals run small so he wears 36 x 32. He asked me if they sold slim fit because his pants were too baggy in the butt and legs, so I ordered slim fit in the same size. Well the waist on the slim fit are much bigger and I should've ordered a size down. I wish Dickies had sizes that were consistent.

reviews.title: Not a good fit
reviews.review_text: These pants are not true to size, and they are also inconsistent. I bought 3 pairs of the same pants - not only did none of them fit, but each of them fit differently. I don't know what happened but the quality has really fallen off.

reviews.title: Seams tearing
reviews.review_text: I bought these oants 2 weeks ago and the inside seam on the left leg, about knee level, is alreqdy starting to tear.

reviews.title: DON'T BUY THESE PANTS
reviews.review_text: I don't know who these pants are made for. The crotch is so shallow that there's no room for your junk, the thighs are so tight that moving is a chore, and the lower leg is exceptionally baggy in huge contrast to the restricting thigh area. I would have returned these had I not accidentally taken all the tags off beforehand.

reviews.title: Lady pants
reviews.review_text: The slim fit is great, just what the 874 needs. But the rise is so short! There is not enough room from the beltline to the crotch. Why did they change the rise!?

reviews.title: Great overall product
reviews.review_text: Nice fit and fair pricing. You will not find a better product for the price. Recommend cold wash and hang to dry. No fabric softener. Great product.

reviews.title: Wedgie City
reviews.review_text: No one told me that “slim fit” meant nothing about the actual pants being any slimmer and just meant that the inseam would be 8 feet up my butt crack. Still quality pants, just wish this was more clear. Id definitely recommend if a key part of your style is to have a constant power wedgie

reviews.title: Slim fit - great idea. Low waist - not so great...
reviews.review_text: I bought two types: the regular and slim fit. I have been wearing the regular for many years and find them great for outdoor work, casual wear and even school (I am a retired teacher). They did, however, strike me as a bit baggy. This time I found a slim fit option and bought one of each (slim and reg.) to compare. I liked the "slim" aspect, but the "low waist" is definitely not for me. Any bending over produces an instant untucked shirt. How about just a "slim fit/regular waist" option?

reviews.title: Runs small
reviews.review_text: The pants are of excellent quality. I had ordered the regular and they were a bit baggy so I thought the slim would do better since I am slim but they were a little tight  around the waist and throughout, same size as the regular but they run really small. I ended up giving them away to someone who is a size smaller than me. They were a little big on him but he could wear them, I couldn't easily bend over.

reviews.title: Large at waist; No taper at waistband
reviews.review_text: Size 34 waist pants measured almost 36". Not "fitted" at waist... Like a pair of 874's with the top inch and a half cut off. I've 4-pair of 874's, (2) 33's and two with 34" waist; all fit far better at the waist than these 873 pants. I'm thin; 5'-7", 140 lbs & 33" waist. Zipper is indeed quite short. Shorter rise than 874's should work better for me since I wear pants on the hip (there's nothing else for them to hang onto). Had to alter the pants by taking up about 1.5" at the back of the waistband (after washing and drying with high heat), feathering the take-out half-way down the seat. So tailored, they now fit well. The "size up" guidance for 874's does not apply to this pair of pants.

reviews.title: Skinner leg than double knee. Very comfortable
reviews.review_text: I love these pants. I've used Dickies all my life. I always wore the double knee ones but now they are looking a little “Hammer Pants”-y. These have just enough slack to not look like Skinny jeans. I do like the clasp closure instead of the button close. The zipper must be brand new. Kinda hard to zip up, but I make it work.

reviews.title: Fit's perfect
reviews.review_text: Love these fits perfect for work skating and going out

reviews.title: Another great purchase!
reviews.review_text: Same as always, thank goodness! Great fit, great quality. Dickies is the forest place I look when I need new pants.

reviews.title: 873 Slim Fit
reviews.review_text: Excellent quality. I already washed my pants and dried them in the dryer, and they fit perfectly. I want to congratulate the company for making these high-quality pants.

reviews.title: These pants launder beautifully after messy work
reviews.review_text: I bought these for my teenage grandson to wear on his job at a fast food kitchen. They hold up to laundering every day and come clean every time to look as good as new. I have ordered a second pair.

reviews.title: Fit big. Size down.
reviews.review_text: I order a size 32 but the waist actually measures 34" even after wash and dry. Love the pants but they're just way too big in the waist. Would recommend sizing down.

reviews.title: Dickie 873 are good quality
reviews.review_text: The Dickies 873 slim fit pants are good quality. I prefer the slim fit trim leg but those appear to be disc by Dickie.. the current version has an extra pocket on the leg which I do not want.

reviews.title: Poor Manufacturing Quality
reviews.review_text: Every Dickies work pants purchased in past 8 years have poor quality on manufacturing. So, why do I continue buying ? Dickies is good for the light duty work wear that I do, and meets minumum dress code. Usually, pants wear out within a year ( color fading, creases gone ). These 873 have same issues as always > cuffs poorly cut ( uneven, at a angle, up to 1/2" short on one side ).
Looked fine,but had to take them to Wal-Mart to exchange for correct size.

reviews.title: Great quality
reviews.review_text: These are the only pants that I wear to work very comfortable

reviews.title: The fit is not what you'd expect.
reviews.review_text: They fit VERY low on your waist. So low that I need a different size than what I normally wear. I have no idea how anyone who isn't in perfect shape can wear these, unless they make them to sit below your belly... I don't get it. Worst fitting pant I've ever tried.

reviews.title: They fit!
reviews.review_text: My husband is 6' 8” and has very skinny legs. He has bought many pairs of the regular 874 style pants, but has never been happy with how they fit. He even had them tailored to fit him better, but they still never fit quite right. These slim fit pants are exactly the right fit for him. I bought one pair for him just to try, and as soon as he put them on, I was told to buy six more pairs. He wears these every day, for work and for everything else. He is just happy to have pants that fit everywhere!

reviews.title: Worthy of a Dúnadan
reviews.review_text: Sturdy, good fit, equally apt for holding council in Rivendell or marching into battle against the hosts of Mordor.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review_text: Great quality and the fit you'd expect from Dickie

reviews.title: Maybe a little too low rise?
reviews.review_text: Absolutely no room in the crotch. I knew they were low rise but they barely made it halfway up my butt before my balls were forced back inside of me.

reviews.title: 874 work pants.
reviews.review_text: Very durable work pants . A little stiff but if you do hard rough work there fine. A few washes n your good to go.

reviews.title: Bad corporate decisions
reviews.review_text: Pants fit great. Problem is poor selection of colors and sizes. I would buy more if they had more colors that had matching shirts in my size.

reviews.title: Modern update to the classic 874s
reviews.review_text: Same classic workpants, but not as baggy as the 874's. Belt loops are bigger. Wears below the waist. A good value and well made product.

reviews.title: Pants for skateboarding
reviews.review_text: Bought these pants for skating because I figured they'd be inexpensive and durable. They proved to be just that. My knee hit pavement first session with them and they slid instead of tore. I bought another pair.

reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing
reviews.review_text: I've been a longtime fan of the Slim Taper work pants. I ordered these in the same size and they were far too small in the thighs and groin, to the point of being unwearable.

reviews.title: Great quality product!
reviews.review_text: Great value and quality! The only pants my husband will wear.

reviews.title: Perfect work pant
reviews.review_text: Durable and long lasting. I have worn this same pant for years.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: It fit me the way I want. I really like the fabric texture. Its high quality

reviews.title: Fits a bit odd.
reviews.review_text: Cut/measurements are a bit Strange. Fits everywhere perfect except my crotch. Which is too snug. I'm skinny 5'9” 140, recommend sizing up a size on the waist.

reviews.title: Good work pants
reviews.review_text: Good sturdy pants but fit a little loose as they have a low rise. Measure below the waist as they sit on the hips so could be different from your regular size.

reviews.title: shameful
reviews.review_text: unbelievably poor workmanship. shameful what these pants have become over the years, just shameful..

reviews.title: Pants
reviews.review_text: You should advertise that your sizes run very small. My husband wears a 29 waist and had to get 31 waist pants so they would fit. He wears 28 waist in every other pant and shorts. It would be helpful especially with dressing rooms closed at stores to know to buy bigger sizes.

reviews.title: Bring back slim tapered
reviews.review_text: Disappointed because I thought they were exactly like the slim tapered pants but I guess they no longer make those... They're just too baggy down the legs... I like the slimmer tapered leggings that way the pants don't cover the entire top of my shoes

reviews.title: Couldn't wear them but would give another shot
reviews.review_text: Great feeling pants but I couldn't wear them. I got my normal size and they were way too short in the crotch area and way too long leg length so I had to give them away. Would probably try another pair but in a store I can try different sizes on first.

reviews.title: Solid All-Purpose Pants
reviews.review_text: A good sturdy pair of work pants, and good-looking enough to wear casually. Fit is good; I opted for a 33x32 rather than my usual 32x32 based on certain other reviews suggesting they were a little too snug, but now I wish I had gone with my usual size.

reviews.title: Great pants! Be careful of sizing.
reviews.review_text: I've worn Dickies 874s for the last 15 years and never had an issue with the sizing. Each new pair was just the same as the last (I buy then six pairs at a time). I decided to try the the Slim Straight Leg pants so I ordered them in the same size (32x32) as my 874s. The Slim Straight Leg pants are about 2 inches larger in the waist and an inch longer in length compared to my 874s. I've washed and dried them multiple times in an unsuccessful attempt get them to shrink. At this point, I'm ordering another set of six in a smaller size and will donating my brand new ones to the Good Will.

reviews.title: Exceptional
reviews.review_text: Pants do exactly as they state, except that I'm a 35" waist for Dickies' pants. I have these in 34" waist, but they are too tight, so I got some one size up but now the 36" are too loose. The fastener on the pants comes undone when I tighten my belt, making it look like I forgot to button my pants. Ironically a button would fix this problem or elastic in the lining.

reviews.title: Do not know what to expect
reviews.review_text: I love the durability of Dickies but sizing is impossible to predict. I have 5 873 pants and all 5 runs different. I normally wear 32 or 33 pants. And this 873 pant I have one size 33, and 4 size 34. The first 2 I bought runs like a normal 33 and these last 2 I bought runs like a normal 34. I really don't know what size to buy. It is always a gamble.

reviews.title: Weird fit
reviews.review_text: Weirdest fitting pants I've ever had. The distance from the crotch to the waistband is super short…I realize these are supposed to sit below the waist, but these are ridiculous. I could barely bend my knees and they'd slide halfway down my rear. Immediately returned them.

reviews.title: Needs a button
reviews.review_text: Wish they had a button, not the cheap clasp that always comes undone when I tighten my belt

reviews.title: Short rise.
reviews.review_text: The rise was incredibly short. Was unable to wear.

reviews.title: not slim fit
reviews.review_text: these are straight leg…don't see how straight leg can be considered ‘slim fit'

reviews.title: 873 slim fit
reviews.review_text: The zipper is just too short and makes them uncomfortable and difficult to tuck in shirt.

reviews.title: who designed this new cut? I can't wear these
reviews.review_text: Nobody is built for these. They are jammed up my crack and still sit so far beneath my waist. they just slide down

reviews.title: Great pants and great price
reviews.review_text: Great fit and comfortable for all day work Price is amazing I tried elsewhere and I still come back to these

reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money
reviews.review_text: Terrible sizing information by website. Plus, the fabric of the pants are not even close to the old ones. I have to return.

reviews.title: Not true to size
reviews.review_text: ordered a 36x30, and the dent fit.. it was more like a 30x30... It wasn't true to size, major disappointment

reviews.title: Too big
reviews.review_text: I recommend going down a size in the waist. Mine were a 32 but fit like 34. Looking into getting them exchanged

reviews.title: Size up.
reviews.review_text: I bought the grey pants. Normally I'm a 34 but these are very snug. They are stretchy everywhere except the waist? Weird. Decided to to lose 10lbs rather than return.

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.review_text: These barely have any room in the crotch area and it kills me since I wanna be comfortable skating so instead of always buying these I'd suggest you get the original 874 pants they're the same but with way more room in the crotch area

reviews.title: Durable
reviews.review_text: Long lasting pants that fit okay. The zipper is high, the bar can rub and press up against. Not so bad if you have a tucked shirt; but can irritate without. I really like the '67 fit and style. They should bring those back.

reviews.title: Size up waist
reviews.review_text: I usually get size 29/30 but with these pants, the 29 waist made the crotch super tight and uncomfortable, so I sized up to 30/30 and they now fit perfectly.

reviews.title: Unless pockets, regular fit below the knee.
reviews.review_text: Only slim on the thighs. So tight pockets are useless. Regular straight leg fit below the knee. Very poor design and look. Extremely uncomfortable. Returning the item

reviews.title: Perfect fit, lightweight un-work pant!
reviews.review_text: Team leader (or 1st victim) who tried these gave em the thumbs up for fit and comfort. "Not so heavy like the others have been" were his exact words. They looked good on him as well.

reviews.title: Happy Mom
reviews.review_text: I love the fit; however, my 12 yr old referred to them as GROWN MAN PANTS 🤣 he is 5'7 ½ (130lbs) sz 31x32... I believe he's starting to like them because they fit NICE without a belt & he's not required to tuck his shirt in 🙄

reviews.title: Good pants, good fit.
reviews.review_text: I am tall and thin. The regular work pants are just too baggy. These are fitted, but not too tight. I am a mechanic, so I do need to be able to move comfortably all day, and these do a good job of that. I like these pants.

reviews.title: Too tight for the boys
reviews.review_text: I went with the slim fit because I'm a skinny guy and figured they'd fit me best. However these pants have me permanently moose knuckling. The crotch is just way too tight. Disappointing because the pant legs are a great fit.

reviews.title: Nice work pant -Dickies quality never disappoints
reviews.review_text: I rarely find my exact size on sale items and was to get thesw pants. Dickies quality and durability has always been outstanding and these pants hold true to that. Fit is on point :)

reviews.title: Pretty all right pants
reviews.review_text: Pretty good waist fit, great leg fit, and the material is phenomenal. I don't know if I have to wash them first cuz I haven't worked in them yet, but from waist to the middle of the thigh is really tight and uncomfortable. I got the right fit and everything. Could be just need to be broken in. But they do have some uncomfortable feeling to them

reviews.title: Best pants ever
reviews.review_text: Dickies slim fit straight leg work pants are the only pants I wear period, when I’m hanging out, going out with my family, or jamming in my band they are the most comfortable pants I’ve ever owned..and regular 874’s are what I wear for work..dickies all the time

reviews.title: Great work pants!
reviews.review_text: Great pair of pants. The fitment on this particular style is the one I like the most. I hope these will never be discontinued in my lifetime. I tried buying this style at the local stores in town, but they no longer carry them. I'm glad you can still order them from Dickies.

reviews.title: Opinion
reviews.review_text: I’ve been wearing dickies khaki pants for many years, and have always been satisfied. In my opinion the pants 5-8 years ago were made better than today’s dickies. Stitching is less precise and more careless, causing loose strings needing to be pulled off. Overall still a good product.

reviews.title: Solid American Workmanship
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing Dickies for working around the home for decades, but I ordered directly through the company for larger color and size selections, and I am thoroughly pleased with the ongoing quality of the Dickies product as well as the rapid turnaround time in delivery. I'll be ordering again.

reviews.title: Good pair of pants
reviews.review_text: The pants are good, the cut is stylish, just wish they came in maybe a 44, 45 or 46 waist. I am still giving it a 5 star because the pants themselves are great just a little too small for me. I will say it runs small for me but it can be just right for you.

reviews.title: Good Pants
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants for everyday wear as I have multiple pairs of similar pants from dickies. Dickies pants are crazy stiff at first but after a few wears and one wash they are AMAZING; soft and durable with great fit. Disclaimer that these pants do shrink slightly when washed. The only reason I did return these and did not like them is because they were the wrong style, same size and everything, just a slightly larger opening at the bottom than the ones I perfer, the slim taper pants.

reviews.title: Slim fit work pants
reviews.review_text: I got these for my son, who works in landscaping, as a replacement for the previous pair of a now discontinued Dickies slim fit pants. I'm sure someone would like these but I doubt my son will even wear these because they are not at all like the other pair. Why are nice, comfortable 28x32 slim fit work pants so hard to find?? And why did Dickies discontinue the one pair that he could wear?

reviews.title: Happy Husband
reviews.review_text: My husband is a small man he wears a 28x32 and I never find good workpants for him. I bought him the Dickies work pant and heloves them. But he wants the heavy duty no rip work pants and you do not have them in 28x32. So we are disappointed in that. He is 61 years old and builds bridges so he works outside and over water all day long. So we would love a thicker pair of work pant in 28x32 so if you ever make them in his size he would ecstatic. Love the pants and wears them proud. If you make a thicker rugged work pant in 28x32 letmeknow asap i willby them.

reviews.title: good work pants
reviews.review_text: First bought these work pants for my husband three or four years ago. I am replacing a few pair, not because they have worn out, but because I have scrubbed one area of his present pants removing some of the color because of rubber getting on the backside from our car. These pants hold up very well and my husband is hard on clothes.

reviews.title: Best pants for your $$$!
reviews.review_text: I bought these for my son. He was in search of chocolate brown dickies. Went and called over 20 stores. Made the mistake of buying them for double the price on Amazon but I was a Mom on a mission. Didn't even think of buying them straight from the source....but eventually I did. The durability of these pants I don't see from the other big skating brands out there. I wish this style was made in more colors like olive green. I'll always continue buying these for my son. He loves them!!!

reviews.title: AWESOME WORK PANTS
reviews.review_text: I BOUGHT TWO OF THEM TO START OF MY CAREER AT ALLDATA. THEY HELD UP WELL FOR EVERYDAY USE BUT FADED IN 9 MONTHS TIME. I WASHED THEM EVERY USE WHICH WOULD BE TWICE A WEEK. I FIGURED IF GET 10 NEW ONES I CAN CUT BACKA ND THEY WOULD HAVE 4 TIMES THE LIFE. VERY STRONG AND

reviews.title: Dickies flat slim fit
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing dickies since I left the service in 1958. I love the wear of these pants and I get many compliments, asking, are those new? When I tell them they are 5 years old, they just look at me, and I must explain why they wear so well. Thank you Dickie, keep up the good work, but how about reducing the price just a little?

reviews.title: Good, but legs need to be slimmer
reviews.review_text: I loved these pants but feel that from the knee down they need to b a bit slimmer or maybe just have the overall legs a 1/2”-1” slimmer from top to bottom. Also the black pair I bought felt 2 sizes too large. If Dickies could make these into the thicker material versions of the 67 series 894s, these would probably become one of the top sellers.

reviews.title: Great Pants
reviews.review_text: Pretty much perfect. A bit shorter in the rise and trimmer all around as others have noted, but other than that, just like for favorite pair of Dickies. Please make them in more colors so I'll have a wider selection when I order another black pair.

reviews.title: Quality stylish work pants
reviews.review_text: I bought these for use at my internship where I am out on a factory floor and working in a lab all day as an engineer. I needed something more formal than jeans but just as durable. I used to wear the Original 874 at a truck wash and knew these were durable pants but wanted the slims for a better fit. They are very comfortable and fit well, except that they are low rise so tucking a shirt in the pants makes you think they should be higher making them tight in the crotch. This is only noticable putting them on in the beginning of the day and disappears once you start moving. Also after the first wash the dye on the edge of the pleat faded a lot making the pleat stand out more than usual. Bought the first pair in navy and am waiting on the second pair in chocolate brown. Works for everything I want it for just wish it was a mid rise pant to give more room.

reviews.title: Great fit. Consistent sizing.
reviews.review_text: I've been buying these pants for years. I've had dozens of them. They sometimes have different model numbers on the tag but anytime they say "slim fit straight leg work pants" they always fit exactly the same. I appreciate the consistency. They are very durable for pants that do not have reinforced knees. Good value and I'm going to continue to buy them.

reviews.title: The crotch it too small
reviews.review_text: These pants are very nice, aside from the fact that the crotch appears to be made for women or boys who say their pants. I'm not a big guy. 6'0" / 160 lbs / Slim I've never had pants give me a wedgie. I do, however, like the legs. They're perfect length. They're slim. And they fit over boots. Just the crotch... I could swear I was sent women's pants.

reviews.title: Classic and Sturdy, But Not Without Their Flaws.
reviews.review_text: These pants are great, they fit well, they are comfortable, and warm but not too warm. There's some light pilling (a surface defect of textiles caused by wear) on the thigh / crouch area already after wearing them consistently for a week (I also noted some stretching of the seems, showing the thread, but it's nothing I am worried about currently). While this may not be a sign of poor craftmanship, or materials used: I am aware of it. The front waist of the pants sits higher than I personally expected. It does ride up over my belt, which causes odd bunching, and correcting every so often. It's not terrible by any means. It may seem like I do not like these pants, but I really do love them, and the company Dickies overall. I may try a different cut next time, but these may become my "go-to" pair for a long while. Very recommended, but please keep note of my light concerns after three-ish weeks of wearing these.

reviews.title: FANTASTIC PANTS
reviews.review_text: I bought 2 pair of these pants for my "tough to fit" son. Size 30" waist 34" length. They fit fabulously and he loves them for work. No iron needed. Great fabric. Great look. Great fit. I will definitely buy these again when he needs new ones (after he eats a cheeseburger:). ).

reviews.title: Great Casual and Work Pants
reviews.review_text: I bought these recently and I have thicker thighs and slimmer calves and these fit very nice. They give a slim and not too skinny fit to them and they can stretch. The material seems like it would last for a while and I am overall very satisfied with the purchase. I am 6'2 and 175 lbs. and ordered the pants in size 32x32.

reviews.title: Dickies slim fit pants
reviews.review_text: I’ve bought a bunch of these pants over the years as I wear them every day for work. I’ve always bought he same size waist (which is 1 size bigger than I wear in any other pants fo some reason) Suddenly this time that size is bigger than the 20 or so pairs I’ve purchased. If I could find this style in a local store I would at least be able to try them on. Since I now don’t know what size to buy I’ll probably jus have to buy a brand that I can find in stores & try on.

reviews.title: Finally Dickies for me
reviews.review_text: Well well well what can I say, finally found Dickies in my size and height all in one. I found that for me Dickies do run small. Even though I can't find Dickies in my size and height in women, the men fit fits just as good and comfortable. I'm 6'1 with a body, my normal size is between 16 and 18 in men but these slim fit pants I had to order a 40 waist and 34 inseam. What a fit. I ordered 6 more for the work I do. I recommend these. I even brought for my son and the work he do. Not in the slim but the original. Big and tall of course. Happy shopping.

reviews.title: Awesome no regrets purchase
reviews.review_text: I have had my chocolate dickies slim fit pants for a week now and theure awesome. Comfy and durable. I work in a kitchen and i always get my pants dirty so i got some dickies and was surprised! they look professional and are resistant to grease... Ill definitely be buying more

reviews.title: Fresh and Durable Pants
reviews.review_text: I usually go with the relaxed fit cargo [#WP592] and double knee [#WP852] pants. Based on previous experience with Dickies pants, they are pretty durable and long lasting. I decided to go with the "slim fit straight leg work pants" [#WP873]. These are not as loose/baggy compared to the other pants that I have gotten. These are also not super tight. I am a bboy so it makes it look more professional as opposed to wearing sweat pants. It's easy to move around in when I dance (such as sliding or spinning on the floor). They are also are great to wear for work during my normal day job. The side pockets can fit a smartphone when I sit in a chair. I'm not sure how well my smartphone would have fit if it were a skinny fit (I guess I'll have to try?). I wish there were more colors and had the design of the double knee work pants. ;)

reviews.title: Casual pants for husband; work pants for son
reviews.review_text: Husband reported that the zipper in the fly is extremely SHORT necessitating that he unsnap as well as unzip in order to visit the little boys room. I have never seen a zipper this short in a pair of men's pants. This is going to be an irritation with daily wear. Would recommend, but caution about the short fly.

reviews.title: Way too small
reviews.review_text: I bought 29x30 and that's the size I usually wear for most brands. These were insanely small in the waist and the inseam. I am not a guy and there was no room down there so I have no idea how there are supposed to fit in them. Definitely size up when buying.

reviews.title: Work pants
reviews.review_text: I wear these as dressier office pants, but they can take a lot more abuse when I'm in the shop. The new ones are a return to the tighter weave fabric of 10 or 15 years ago. They are not as soft to the touch as previous recent ones, but they hold a crease and take abuse a lot better. I'm glad they returned to this fabric.

reviews.title: Kind of weird fit.
reviews.review_text: Only reason I'm giving 4 stars and not 5 is based upon sizing…In the regular work pants I wear a 42 in the hips, but somehow 42's in the “slims” are significantly bigger…It's awkward to have your pants fit tight and nice in the legs, but have your butt showing because the fit even with a belt, has your pants falling down constantly. Overall, I love these pants though! I wear them at work, when I'm riding with the homies, and when I'm doing whatever with the wife…So, still considered a win in my book.

reviews.title: Great pants! Need more colors!
reviews.review_text: Love these pants. They fit true to size and I didn't see any shrinkage after a couple of washes. These are the exact same pants as the 874's with a slimmer fit. Not too skinny or baggy, just right. Only complaint is I want more colors. Specifically olive green. Otherwise these are flawless. Favorite pants.

reviews.title: too-snug fit, stiff, scratchy feel
reviews.review_text: Bought for work. I normally wear slim-straight jeans & I bought my size, 31. These fit oddly. They were too tight around the waist, and had a long, flat appearance in the front. They do not actually sit below the waist; it is too long a rise for that. The very stiff, scratchy fabric combined with this to produce immediate discomfort. I returned them right away. The fabric is tough though.. I think these would wear well.

reviews.title: Great for skinny guys
reviews.review_text: It's hard for skinny guys to wear normal Dickies 874's and not look like they're either wearing high-waters or clown pants. The slim straights are basically the same leg width, but are designed to be worn at the hip, instead of the waist. It makes a big difference. One thing to note though is that because they rest on the hip, the "waist" sizes run bigger, so instead of getting your normal size, get them a size smaller.

reviews.title: Slim Fit Straight Leg Work Pants
reviews.review_text: the crotch area is getting smaller in these pants even the zipper has a 1" opening, you have to unbuckle your belt, unbutton your pants, pull down the zipper, pull down your pants a bit to pee i've had 4 pairs in the past and every time they've gotten smaller around the crotch area

reviews.title: Perfect slim fit work pants!
reviews.review_text: These pants are everything they should be and nothing else. Perfect SLIM in seat and thigh fit! The waist sits pefect on top of the hip, under the belly as a slim fit pant should. Of course, they're Dickies quality, so they're tough as nails and stain resistant.

reviews.title: Great pants
reviews.review_text: I bought a pair in blue. They are a little darker than i expected. I got size 29/30. I am 5'7 and about 140lbs. They fit great all the way around but are just a little snug in the crotch. However, you get used to it after a while and they are currently my favorite pants. I havent spent much time working in them but they are durable so far.

reviews.title: More Sizes Please
reviews.review_text: I would love it if you offered a wider range of sizes for tall skinny folks. Options are either a little too short or a little too big around the waist. 32"x36" please. That aside, these are the best pants for the money. They're great for outdoor activities since they dry fast and don't rip easy. They're also classy enough to wear to the office. Best of both worlds.

reviews.title: Needs better quality assurance
reviews.review_text: Ordered 2 black 38/30 and a khaki 38/30. The khaki fit a little bigger than a 38, but the black pants fit more like a 36 and the inseam measured 33 inches. Very inconsistent sizing. Black pants were manufactured in Nicaragua, khaki was manufactured in Honduras

reviews.title: Dickies slim fit are the best pants in existence
reviews.review_text: These are the best pants ever which is why they are all I wear!! The brown pair for some reason breaks in to be the most comfortable pants ever! They are so comfy and durable. Please never stop making the brown slim fit. I have owned every color of these and they just don't all break in the same

reviews.title: Nice Pant but size way up or get the non slim fit
reviews.review_text: Dickies overall sizing is confusing in any pants. But I wear a 28 in women and thought I'd be safe ordering a 30 in these. I can button them but I should've ordered a 32 or 33 even for them to fit. If you have a normal size butt, these probably aren't for you. Other than that, the color and fabric is nice I just wished I exchanged for the right size before taking tags off.

reviews.title: Great pants after a long search
reviews.review_text: We've been looking for a pair of work pants that are not only well made, but look great. These pants fit the bill 100%. Great color selection also. We'll definitely be buying more. They're a little stiff, but I'm not complaining. It's very, very good material and softens after a wash or two.

reviews.title: Great workpants!
reviews.review_text: My husband has been wearing these for years-he needed replacements so I got him 3 pair and with the free shipping and discount code it was an awesome deal! The only thing I would change about these is maybe to add a little stretch to them-spandex-at least even if only in the waist. These are very durable pants and last a long time.

reviews.title: Nothing better than fresh dickies
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing original dickies everyday for the last 10years. This is the first time ordering the slim fit straight. They are the same quality. The fit seems a little different. They sit lower but seem just at baggy. I probably won't wear them to work. They will be my good going out dickies. Also the belt loops are larger, making it easier to get a belt through. However the loops are in different spots, putting my wallet chain is kind of a strange spot.

reviews.title: Workpants worked as school uniform.
reviews.review_text: I brought these for 3yrs as school uniform pants. Less ironing and sturdy enough for high school boys. Great fit 30 waist and 32 lenght one year to 32 waist and 34 length the last year. They handle weekly washing just like I would except professional uniforms to. My son and his school never complained. So we're all very happy and satisfied with Di kies work/uniform slim pants. Much cheaper than school uniform pants and better quality.

reviews.title: Sizing is way off compared to Dickies 874
reviews.review_text: I normally wear Dickies 874 in size 31w 32l. I ordered these “Slim Fit” pants in size 30w 32l. My 874's fit perfectly but are too baggy in the thigh area. That's why I ordered the slim fit. These are huge! I have an old pair of 874's in 32 waist that are not as big as these. All 3 pairs are this way. I washed and dried a pair hoping they would shrink some and no dice. What a waste. The zipper is also half the length of the 874's. These are horrible and are no representation at all of the Dickies brand.

reviews.title: These arent slim fit
reviews.review_text: Make sure you try these on, i have multiple dickies from the 5 pocket twill, double knee, core work pant and original fit. I mistakenly bought these, expecting something between the core and 5 pocket...these are NOT slim fit by any means, they're closer to the fit of the double knee (baggy) and in typical dickie fashion, the 32" inseam is not the same as the 32" fit in the other models, so make sure these are exactly what you're expecting and ideally, try them on first. Live and learn.

reviews.title: Best all around pant
reviews.review_text: I purchased these for school and skateboarding, two things that aren't generally combined. So the fact that I can wear these skateboarding and not worry about ripping or tearing them is a big deal. They fit perfect and come in most colors you could want. Very durable yet comfortable.

reviews.title: Dickies for life!
reviews.review_text: I've worn Dickies throughout my early teens into adulthood. Primarily because of music, bands, and art. It's just always been part of that culture. The quality is great, it's inexpensive, and timeless. The customer service is great, they respond and do their best to make the customer happy.

reviews.title: Good looking, good fit.
reviews.review_text: I bought these for my stepson. Too bad they are not available in my size, but alas, no. It seems all manufacturers are of the opinion that when a man's girth increases, so does his rear, and they (you), not only increase the rear, but also add to the rise. Sush is not the case and you should survey rotund men to find out what they would really like. How about a slim fit, straight leg, short rise to fit a 50 inch girth.

reviews.title: Everything is great except for the sizing
reviews.review_text: Quality, color, material, everything is good on the pants, but the waist sizing is terribly off. I normally wear a 36, ordered a 38, and it is still small. There is also no stretch at all in these pants(as described), so be sure to order a size, even two up.

reviews.title: Slim straight
reviews.review_text: I bought these to replace my 874s which I've always found to have too much rise and are baggy on me. These fit great. I'm tall and fairly thin so it just made sense to try a slim pant. Plus i don't have to search through dozens of sizes to find my 36 x 34s.

reviews.title: Back pocket sewn closed but pants are nice
reviews.review_text: Got them in the mail quickly. Unfortunately, I threw out my receipt and cannot exchange. The back pocket was sewn completely shut in a way that I cannot cut it free without cutting a hole in the pocket itself. But, these are Dickies quality and nice pants per usual.

reviews.title: Great pants
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants for my father to wear for work. He is a blacksmith so they are really put to the test. They hold up better than any pants he has ever had. The slim cut is great because too much room in the thighs can be dangerous. He has been wearing this style for 2 years now and won't buy any other kind.

reviews.title: Straight Fit, NOT Relaxed as stated!
reviews.review_text: I bought these for work in a size 16 and they are way too tight. I couldn't even close the zipper. Order a size up.They are a straight fit, not relaxed as stated in the description. If you have any hips at all, do not buy these. Now I have to pay to send them back.

reviews.title: Okay work pants
reviews.review_text: The leg opening could be 3cm smaller and be a nice slim straight. The crotch is too high and the zipper is cheap for a pair of cheap pants. You need to make sure to wear a belt since it has a hook and loop closure, not a button. The material is nice, durable.

reviews.title: No crotch room!
reviews.review_text: I was excited to get these pants! I have 4 pair of dickies I wear to work and the legs are all kind of big on me. There is no way I can wear these... the hips are too low and they are very uncomfortable if I have to kneel down in them. I am sending back!

reviews.title: Greatest work pants ever
reviews.review_text: I juat started buying these pants 2 years ago and they are great. I use them for yard work, riding ATVs anything that involves being outside. They are durable, comfortable and built to last. The only reason I buy more of them is to have more pairs when the wife falls behind on laundry.

reviews.title: Slim fit? Really?
reviews.review_text: 17” leg openings make me feel like it’s the 70’s and I’m on my way to a disco. I got a pair skinny straight next but they have only a 13” leg opening and fit too tight. What fit falls between skinny and slim? I’m not aware of such a fit, at least not by Dickies. Prices are great though, so if you can find your fit, Dickies are a good buy.

reviews.title: Fits great but…
reviews.review_text: I love these pair of Dickies slim fit work pants. I think the normal non slim fit ones look like baggy pants. They are very durable and kinda stiff when you first try them on. I would recommend washing them first before wearing them and also, I would recommend buying a size up ie. if you wear a 34/30 get a 36/30 instead. They shrink over a period of time and they will eventually become a size 34 by the time it's worn and wash enough. It would be nice to have a shorter seam length like down to a 26 or 28 for the shorter leg folks. Otherwise, good pants for automotive attire.

reviews.title: Great work pants
reviews.review_text: I bought these for my son for work. They appear to be very durable and stands up to a great deal of moving around without ripping or wearing out quickly at the knees or elsewhere. And they look nice enough to wear in the office as well as on the job site. They are a heavier weight than I expected but not as heavy as the Dickies Original work pants. The fabric is a little stiff and had to wash it several times before it was more pliable. The only issue was that they run a little bit small. My son wears a 32" waist. I got these in a 34" and they were still a little snug.

reviews.title: Great pants!
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants several years ago when they finally were out I tried several different other brands but never found anything as comfortable as the dickies . So I purchased five more pairs are use them as part of a work uniform they keep their dark color for long periods of time.

reviews.title: Quality Control Inspections
reviews.review_text: Can't give your company five (5) stars, because out of five pairs of pants I ordered one pair had the side seams out line. another pair the inside waist band had to be repaired. my wife done the repairs, I still like your company, and will contenue to buy from you.

reviews.title: Quality Pants but a Bit Snug on the Plums
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants to wear everyday at work. I work in both an office and manufacturing floor setting, so it's good to have something that is durable and comfortable. I like these pants because they have a tough fabric that doesn't feel too heavy, i.e. they breathe.The quality on these is superior to all the other pants I own. Without thinking much of it I bought these pants in my normal size. The crotch fit very shallow relative to where the waste is, so my plums were getting some serious interference from the pants, as was my bum. They also seemed a little short. I made a hassle-free exchange for a pair that was one waste size and one leg length larger and that seemed to take care of the problem. Once you get the size dialed in, these are a great pair of pants that should last you a while.

reviews.title: Charter school uniform
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants for my grandson. His school required the Dickies brand and I found them to be reasonable priced. My grandson wanted the slim fit straight leg style and was very happy with the purchase. He's 14, wears a 30x34 and wanted to look nice on his first day of high school! No complaints on my purchase. Very happy and will purchase more.

reviews.title: Bummer
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately- can't even wear these because the crotch inseam is *very high*. I actually came to double check if I'd ordered women's pants by accident. A shame because I love the fit down the leg, and was really looking forward to a new pair of dickies.

reviews.title: Not as expected from description
reviews.review_text: I bought 2 pairs of the slim fit work wear pants but when I tried them on they ended up fitting almost exactly as the classic fit did. The issue was that with the item being slim fit, they were still as wide as the regular pairs. The crotch area rides high in the slims. I wished that dickies would alter their descriptions or just refit the sizing for the slim manufacturering. I ended up stumbling on the tapered leg and those were prefect.

reviews.title: Well
reviews.review_text: Well, I brought my son 5 pair of pants and they all smelled like fish. I'm not sure where they were imported from but that's what they smelled like. So that's the reason for the 3 stars otherwise I would have given it a 5 star for the quality. PS. Be sure to wash them,and add plenty of Downey

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.review_text: I've been ordering from this site for a few years, and I remember they always sent stickers and coupons, now - nothing. And all the prices went up, and the material is thin flimsy twill, not the OG durable dickies material I used to get. The pants look good and fit good, aside from the crotch being a bit tight and sometimes uncomfortable. Overall meh, probably won't order from this site again.

reviews.title: Sizes inconsistent
reviews.review_text: I love Dickie's pants. I ordered the slim fit because the pair of regular fit pants I have is a bit big through the legs. I ordered the exact same size in slim fit--the legs seem to fit better but the waistline has a solid inch or two of extra fabric. I will need to take the slim fit pants in at the waist. Not sure why the difference.

reviews.title: Best Work and Pleasure Pants
reviews.review_text: I was first introduced to Dickies a few years ago when my friend told me about them. He had two pairs, maroon and black. The pants had a beautiful crease that seemed to fade for the better. Stains and scuffs increased the look and the pants defended them appropriately. For such a low price, you're guaranteed to get a good fitting pant that'll last long. They may take some breaking in at first, but they will be worth it after a handful of wears.

reviews.title: Solid pants, inconsistent fit
reviews.review_text: These are my 5th or so pair of dickies for work- the durability and comfort are amazing but the fit, specifically leg width, have been different for each pair. These slim straights are about the same as my first pair of slim skinnies, while my 2nd and 3rd pairs of slim skinnies were very tight and even tighter, respectively. Other than that, you can't beat these pants for taking a beating, looking good, and staying black.

reviews.title: DICKIES SLIMS
reviews.review_text: My husband does warehouse work and the denim Dickies they provided were too baggy and really heavy coming out of the wash. These slims fit him really well as he is 6'3” and thin. Although the material is thinner than denim, they are definitely more breathable and still durable. Definitely worth the money! Bought 5 pairs.

reviews.title: Slim pants, slim guy
reviews.review_text: I'm 6' and a hundred and sixty pounds. These fit me the way that 874's fit normal people. I wear these for both work and casual scenarios. They release soils well, resist wrinkling and make your butt look more appealing. At least that's what it feels like. Dickies are a part of my life and I love the pants for being there for me and making my lower half decent. True believer til I die.

reviews.title: First time 873 work pant purchase
reviews.review_text: I was worried they would be too slim since I've worn the 874 original work pants for many many years now. I see the difference in the fit but I can say they feel just as relaxed/loose as the 874. I'm happy with the slimmer fit as it's not as slim as one might think.

reviews.title: Idk
reviews.review_text: It didnt go too well for me. I didnt know that the material would be like this meaning i shouldve gone up a size. Didnt think they would be this stiff. Shoudlve bought one pair first to test it not 5 right away Its whatever tho The quality seems pretty good though especially for the really good price

reviews.title: Slim waist but baggy legs!?
reviews.review_text: I am a part time tailor and these pants by definition are not slim fit. All of my dickies are alter upon delivery. On the bright side the overall texture and sturdiness of the pants are definitely good quality but again they are very cookie cutter like and more like a generic straight-legged cut pants fyi.

reviews.title: Tight on the crotch
reviews.review_text: I bought these online because most stores that carry Dickies does not have the slim straight fit. When I first tried them on they felt stiff as most Dickies are before the first few washes, but after walking in them for just a short time I noticed how uncomfortably high the crotch was that didnt give any comfort for "my boys" to relax while bending down or even walking. Perhaps Dickies should come out with a pant that sits below the waist with the slim straight leg.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: Long lasting pants, resistant fabrics, variety of colors, and styles. However when I wear a slim belt the pants tend to expose the white color from inside along the belt and the pockets. Maybe a minor detail but if Dickies could match the color would be great.

reviews.title: Go-To Pants - Finding The Right Model
reviews.review_text: After trying several different style of dickies, I have mostly stocked my closet with the slim-fit straight-leg. I am NOT a skinny legged hipster, OR a brawny construction worker. I use these daily for work, cooking in a restaurant kitchen, outdoors, camping and hiking, and everyday dog walking. I destroy my clothes with, and these hold up well and get more comfortable over time. They look good as casual slacks too. The taper leg is nice as well, but the straight leg gives a little more room to move.

reviews.title: Not Slim Fitting
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants last month for my birthday in January & when i got them you would've thought I ordered baggy bootcut pants. I'm still having to wash them so they shrink down to the appropriate size. If you're buying def buy a smaller size. Great quality pants though.

reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing between colors
reviews.review_text: I bought the same size pants in 4 different colors and only 2 of the colors fit, the other two do not, and the two that do fit have an entirely different fit than a previous pair of slim fit straight work pants that I already owned. I am very disappointed as I am unable to wear half of my order. The consistency on these is garbage!

reviews.title: Amazing fit!
reviews.review_text: I skate but don't like flex pants like the 894s, yet I love the fit. These pants gave me the answer! Same slim fit as the 894s but sturdy and stiffer the way I'm used to skate pants feeling. I dont like flex pants cause it feels like I'm wearing old man dress pants, or almost like sweatpants/pajama bottoms. These 873s are the bomb!

reviews.title: Gives me a wedgie
reviews.review_text: Great pants so far. I didn’t expect the pants to fit below the waist so that’s my fault for not reading the description. In addition to that the pants really ride up on the butt area and give me a wedgie even though I wear them below the waist. Tight in the butt/ not enough space in crotch area

reviews.title: Huge Sizing Issue
reviews.review_text: Sizing compared to the original fit is way off. I needed work pants that weren't so baggy so when I found these online I ordered what should have been my regular waist and leg 38x34. When I got them I realized I should have ordered TWO SIZES smaller than all of my other pants. I still can't believe how big the waist was considering the website mentioned nothing about this fit running large. They were ridiculously large. No where in the description does it say these pants run large so I ordered the same size of the dickies I buy at the store. I would have returned them but I needed my work pants right away and did not have time to go through the return and exchange process. Dealing with other companies before and understanding that not much can be done for compensation I just left it alone and lived with wearing these pants way too big. I don't have much free time and I work hard for my money. I don't make much money so when I spend my hard-earned money and invest it and something that I need I would assume that I would get what I thought I was ordering. I am only writing this review right now because I just received an email requesting my review on the specific item months later after my initial purchase. Other then being disappointed in the sizing these pants are great but I will not be ordering from the website anymore I probably won't buy any more dickies at all

reviews.title: Great Pants!!
reviews.review_text: I am tall and skinny. The slim fit straight leg fits the best. I've always had a problem with pants staying up; don't have that issue with these. The lower rise allows my belt to sit right at my hips where it needs to in order to hold my pants up while not looking like I have a saggy bottom. No issues so far!

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.review_text: I thought these would be considerably less baggy than the cargo pants and Regular straight leg pants but hardly. Traditional hard stiff dickies with the horrible slide clasp up top, I will always prefer a button. 34 fits like a 35. More details in the description would be nice and pictures to follow about type of measurements the model is and type of closure used (button, snap, clasps).

reviews.title: Slim straight fit work pants
reviews.review_text: I bought a pair of Straight fit tapered work pants 4 months ago & found them to be a very comfortable fit ! ... So I decided to buy another 2 pair 2 weeks ago .... Unfortunately am disappointed as the waist sizing is somewhat bigger than my originally purchased pair !!

reviews.title: Not what I hoped
reviews.review_text: I finally bought my first pair of Dickies after working with several guys who have said great things about them. I purchased the slim fit work pants and was very surprised in the fit and the comfort. I would recommend ordering a waist size smaller than usual. I was also hoping they would be more comfortable, but instead, were very stiff. Still looking for a pair of work pants with a little more comfort that do not sacrifice durability.

reviews.title: Best Work Pants
reviews.review_text: Sleek, stylish, and durable. These pants let me do whatever and look good doing it. The only complaint i could articulate is the khaki colored work pants came out of the factory smelling like rotting lobster; not sure how or why but they were fine after the first wash.

reviews.title: Much better fit
reviews.review_text: I'm 6'-3", 200 lbs and these pants are a much better fit than standard 874s. In 874s the butt is all saggy but in the slim fit there's much less butt sag. The belt loops are larger too. So I can get the second overlap of the belt through a loop without having to pinch and work it through. The waist is just a touch large but they're much better than 874s.

reviews.title: Hard to go to the bathroom
reviews.review_text: The pants are decent quality but I do not understand what is going on with the Fly/Inseem. It is VERY challenging to go to the bathroom. I havent actually measured the Fly but it appears to be approx 3" long (can barely get hand in) and located very high. I feel like the Fly/Front Rise was designed by women, for women. Am I missing something? I spent a lot of money on 3 pairs of each color and these pants are designed pretty poorly.

reviews.title: Slim….low rise simple work pant
reviews.review_text: Great fitting, long lasting pant that sits lower and at a more reasonable height. I always liked the 874 style but found them to sit at an uncomfortable level above my waist and were a little baggy for my likings. The 873 solves all these issues. My only complaint is I feel the newer ones recently don't have that much scotchguard or whatever they apply to them that repels liquids as after one washing the pants seem to absorb liquid. The ones from years ago lasted months before this would happen. Still a good pant.

reviews.title: Good, durable pants
reviews.review_text: Like these pants a lot. I ordered them in black. Even after washing them several times, they can easily pass as dress pants, or be worn casually with my boots or shoes. One nice benefit of the pants is that they don't pick up cat hair and lint nearly as much as 100% cotton pants.

reviews.title: Gets the job done
reviews.review_text: The material is pretty thick I bought 28x30 washed on hot dried on hot inseam shrank to 29 but I wanted it to. The thick material though didn't let the leg opening settle/soften down but it measures 8" as it stated. The only thing I didn't like is the rise it's extremely low and believe me it's not new to me. But for the cut and what they are trying to market I don't think that low of a rise made any sense. I have fairly slim legs usually wear 6-7" hem openings. So I ended up donating the pants to church. I'll guess I'll try the slim taper they have and pray it isn't too tight because of the thicker material

reviews.title: I love these!
reviews.review_text: I already own the 874 Dickies and I wanted to try a different fit in other colors. The slim straight fits are pretty great. I mix it up and Dickies are my new everyday pants. I wear a 31x30 in other pants. These were perfect at 33x30. So order 2 sizes up.

reviews.title: These Work Pants Are Great!
reviews.review_text: I bought these as a gift for my son to wear for work. They look dressy enough to meet the dress code...but hold up well under a tough work load. He finds them comfortable. What we both found particularly helpful is the stain resistance of the fabric. Through...inattention, I'll say....the pants were exposed to a great deal of melted red wax on the seat. With some scraping, stain remover and the innate stain resistance of these pants.....the wax stains went away. The slim fit gets rid of the baggy look as well as being in style.

reviews.title: Upset
reviews.review_text: Ordered from Walmart it ended up being a third party, they were too big. I could not return.

reviews.title: Dark brown please
reviews.review_text: Please bring back dark brown color for slim fit straight leg

reviews.title: Extremely tight around the groin
reviews.review_text: I really want to like these pants. I have a tall, slim figure (6'1”, 155lbs) and I like the cut around the legs. Only problem is they're very tight around the groin. Have to wear these very low on the hips and almost sag. It's so bad that it feels like walking around with a permanent wedgie and a visible crease in the crack. I'm struggling to understand what kind of person would fit well in these, as someone with a slim build and almost no behind I don't see how anyone with a thicker build could comfortably wear these without these pants completely riding up their rear. Going to keep these in hopes that they loosen up a bit over time and because they're cheap with a nice fit around the legs.

reviews.title: The 873!
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing these religiously since my teens and will do so until I'm in the grave. Timeless and iconic.

reviews.title: Pants do not stay closed properly j
reviews.review_text: We like everything about these pants except the way they close ..they need to change it to buttons! The metal closure can slide open too easily.

reviews.title: The best work pants
reviews.review_text: These are the perfect work pants. They don't stain, shrink or fade. I'm a barista and we can wear jeans to work, but black Dickies are the way to go.

reviews.title: Refund
reviews.review_text: Zipper is to short. Have to undo Pam's like a child when have to use a restroom. No good pants. Possibly refund ? Thanks

reviews.title: Great work pants

reviews.title: Great product

reviews.title: Pants runs very small

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.review_text: The are not baggy and loose like the pants our company provides. In addition the color is retained much better.

reviews.title: Didn't fit after wash

reviews.title: Boxy fit

reviews.title: Good pants but...

reviews.title: They're Dickies, what can I say?
reviews.review_text: They're Dickies. What else to say? Perfect fit. Not too slim. Same durable material and construction.

reviews.title: Pants rating.
reviews.review_text: These a good pants that fit well. It's hard to find dickies that fit well when i can't by them in person.

reviews.title: Best pants
reviews.review_text: I bought the same model number as I usually do, just a different color, and they fit perfectly just as expected; quality control is on point.

reviews.title: Work or Leisure Pants
reviews.review_text: I purchased these work pants nearly one month ago and they are very comfortable for work and leisure wear. This not my first time purchasing work pants and other from Dickies. I highly recommend their service.

reviews.title: Double Knee Work Pants
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately for me, I'm between a 34 and 36 inch waist. I actually need a 35 1/2 which does not exist. I love your products and would highly recommend them.

reviews.title: Dd
reviews.review_text: Pants are great but please please take me off the email list. Too many emails, I specifically didn't check the box to get notifications. Thank you. Also was a bummer to pay for shipping when the pants didn't fit the first time

reviews.title: Great online purchase experience
reviews.review_text: I ordered 6 pairs of pants and a belt on Cyber Monday (25% off!). They beat all store prices. I had them within a few days. Shipping was free and fast. These are the only brand I wear for work.

reviews.title: Best Work Pants
reviews.review_text: My husband loves these pants. Since he is a size 31 waist, it was hard to find to find pants that wouldn't leave him looking baggy and unprofessional. These Slim pants are perfect.

reviews.title: Work pants
reviews.review_text: I could not find any pants for my son for his job, which required Dickies, black pants. He is a slim fit and I sm so glad I went to your website and found exactly what I needed. He had them within a week!

reviews.title: Awesome pants for skating'
reviews.review_text: These pants are perfect for skateboarding! My next pair of pants will be a pair of dickies. I would love if they offered them in khaki on the online store.

reviews.title: slim fit straight leg work pant
reviews.review_text: have bought dickies for several years and my husband loves them; when I noticed that the butt was looking "big" on him I went to your website and looked for a slimmer fit - ordered 4 pairs for now and he loves them.....................

reviews.title: Skating
reviews.review_text: Bought these for skating and used them for camping. Great overall. Only four stars because they were pretty baggy but I also sized up and they do not vent very well but that is okay.

reviews.title: Great fit pants
reviews.review_text: I have purchased the 874 work pants in the past, but found the slim fit pants. They are the same strong pants Dickies are famous for, but are cut for us guys who don't need a full cut pants. Glad you guys put these in the inventory.

reviews.title: Good work pants.
reviews.review_text: Pants looks and feels like it'll last forever! Unfortunately, it was too big. But their Customer Service was awesome and provided the return label and wil get me the refund upon receipt. I'll just buy the smaller size.

reviews.title: Smelly pants
reviews.review_text: I have ordered pants from Dickies for my son for 6 years. This is the only year that I've been disappointed with my order. The pants have a fishy smell to them. I had to wash all of pants 2 times before the smell was tolerable.

reviews.title: Very nice product.
reviews.review_text: I purchased these pants for my son, who is taking a technical training course this year in school. We were unable to find his size in a regular store. He says they are working out really good for him.

reviews.title: Slim fit straight leg work pants!
reviews.review_text: I'm not going to lie, I look at a lot of these reviews and I think that they are fake. But to tell you the truth these are the best fitting work pants I have ever bought. I will be buying more thank you!

reviews.title: I have worn Dickies work pants for21 years.
reviews.review_text: I bought three pairs of them. When I tried them on, they didn't fit. The pants are labeled 36 waist and 30 inch length. they are more like 40 inch waist. what are my options?

reviews.title: Best work pants I ever bought!
reviews.review_text: I have a hard time finding my pants size. I cant buy anything at the store, or online, that doesn't need to be altered. When I received my pants, as usual i was waiting for the big fix, but no alterations needed and they fit great.

reviews.title: Best work pants
reviews.review_text: My husband had recently lost weight and I told him we needed to get him a smaller waist size, when they arrived it took a couple of days to get him to try them on, and when he did, he said THANK YOU and I got a big hug!!!!

reviews.title: Slim Fit
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing Dickies work pant's, shirts and t shirts for for 10 years. I would like to see a button or snap on the pants rather than the unreliable hook. Other than that they are perfect long lasting work clothes.

reviews.title: slim straight work pant
reviews.review_text: i buy these work pants not for work but for the working class slams i take while skateboarding. boy do they hold up. a slide across concrete pavement, nothing to my dickies.

reviews.title: the pants that help you get it done
reviews.review_text: I work in maintenance. So I pretty much do it all. These pants don't restrict my movement so I can climb, crawl and run if I need to. I've had these pants for about 5 months. True to fit and they haven't faded just wish they were spot resistant.

reviews.title: Great pants.
reviews.review_text: My nephew lives in Cambridge, England and asked me to bring these pants to him when I went to visit. He immediately put them on and has been wearing them ever since. He is 18 and on his way to college.

reviews.title: Not very slim..
reviews.review_text: These are exactly like the original dickies, a little too baggy and gangster for me. I was hoping they would be slim and look more professional, but that is not the case. They are just like the originals.

reviews.title: Best Customer Service!
reviews.review_text: Purchased 2 pair of Dickies pants for my crazily tall son, but they were too short. The return was super easy, and the money went right back into my account. Reordered with longer inseam, and they’re perfect! My son wants them in every color.

reviews.title: nice Dickies
reviews.review_text: I bought this to see how good they were i have heard of Dickies but never bought any well they are great and would recomend them to any one looking for a great pair of pants will definitely buy another pair

reviews.title: Fabric difference.
reviews.review_text: Fabric of grey color and blue color pants a lot thinner, and more light weight than black pair that I ordered a few weeks ago. Definitely a slim fit leg but these are for my teenage son and he likes the tighter leg fit.

reviews.title: Great pants to schralp in
reviews.review_text: I skate in these, they're much like the 874s but with a lower waist. I like 874s and these, I just like to switch it up; the lower waist provides a little more looseness in the waist, it's nice sometimes.

reviews.title: I want the shorts versiion back!
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing these for years. Work well around the canoe shop and look profeesional. Last year they dropped the shorts version which made me hunt around.Only issue is some shrinkage...

reviews.title: Great for skateboarding
reviews.review_text: I bought these at the end of the summer to skate and they're holding up to all the abuse better than almost any other pants I have. plus they look classy

reviews.title: Outstanding pants
reviews.review_text: I bought these for skateboarding and they are very comfortable and light weight so it's not too heavy. They are flexible in a way you can make movements and not rip. I suggest these pants for many others to experience

reviews.title: Big Slim
reviews.review_text: Dickies are always a solid choice. These pants are no different. The only thing I would say is they aren't quite as 'slim' as I thought but still good!

reviews.title: THESE PANTS ARE EXCELLENT FOR SKATERS
reviews.review_text: My son skateboards and runs through pants ike crazy about 2 years ago a friend recommended Dickies, These are very durable and last a long time even though my son still wears through the knees now it takes him months instead of weeks.

reviews.title: Best working dress pants
reviews.review_text: I wear these pants to work everyday and so far they are the best suitable wear ,comfortable and fit properly. The only fault I find is the hook at the waist tend to get loose would prefer a button. .

reviews.title: Best work pants

reviews.title: Great Pants!
reviews.review_text: I have bought the same pant style and color 4 times, and love them. They fit great through the leg, and waist. Also, they are great to wear out, and to work.

reviews.title: Comfort, fit, and prine... what every man wantsclo

reviews.title: Slim fit straight leg pants

reviews.title: Slim Khaki

reviews.title: My favorite pants!

reviews.title: Good service
reviews.review_text: The pants I got for my son were a quality product but unfortunately I had to return them because it tuned out it was not the style he was looking for.

reviews.title: Good fit and quality

reviews.title: Great fit and quality

reviews.title: Custom made fit

reviews.title: My son always request these

reviews.title: Slim Fit really does!

reviews.title: A little disappointed!

reviews.review_text: My son loves the Dickies clothes line. Wares the 11 inch and the 13 inch work shorts. This is his everyday ware. I recommend buying for they are durable, comfortable, and wash up nicely. You get a long time ware.

reviews.title: Great working pants

reviews.title: Great work pants!
