reviews.title: Durable
reviews.review_text: I am using Dickies for over 40 years; Several trousers have lasted for 30 years; and I still wear them for woods and field. They are the longest lasting trousers on the market. And, they look nice.

reviews.title: Pants
reviews.review_text: The fit was great . But they smell of them were disgusting they smelled like fish really bad. I had to wash them then soak them in downey to get the smell out. Other than the smell the pants are great.

reviews.title: Great pants for a lady :)
reviews.review_text: These pants fit exactly as I needed them to. I am a woman and was looking for a pair to wear with a crop top and sneakers. They are a little snug going over my hips but once they're on they fit perfect.

reviews.title: 34x30 slim straight work pants
reviews.review_text: One pair fit but the other did not. Same style and size pants. The blue pair fit. Black did not. 1st time having this issue. Had to triple check size. Waited too long to return. I was sick when order came.

reviews.title: Amazing pants
reviews.review_text: These are my favorite work pants to wear. I don't like the other pants that have the side pockets by the knees, so this was perfect for what I needed it for. You can pull a professional look with a collar shirt.

reviews.title: Great fit and durable
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants for filed for uniform and they are great!!!! They don't get dirty easily and repel water really good. Wash great and dont shrink. Highly recommend the slim fit leg

reviews.title: Great Everyday Pants
reviews.review_text: Bought a single pair of these, found them to fit fine (though the legs are a bit baggier than the photo suggests). Very comfortable, seem durable, as I have found Dickies products to be, on sale to boot.

reviews.title: Very Pleased With Slim Fit Straight Work Pants
reviews.review_text: Have just completed one week wearing my new Dickies Slim Fit work pants. Best fit I have ever had in work pants. These will be my go-to pants for work.

reviews.title: Eh...
reviews.review_text: They are work pants to get dirty. Not very comfortable but they get the job done. I made the mistake of only paying attention to the length in the waist. The leg length is two inches to long so they kind of look funny on me.

reviews.title: We shall see!!!
reviews.review_text: They seem like a good pair of work pants but a little more snug than I'd like so gotta go up a size and see if that helps out then we shall see if they are as good as the rest of my dickies.

reviews.title: slim fit straight pants
reviews.review_text: I have been ordering these pants 4 my teenage son for several months now. I love the durability & colors. They don't wrinkle after washing!!! Its true. My son is very active & only wades. Dickies.

reviews.title: Do they make my stroke look fat?
reviews.review_text: Been wearing Dickies for years now and I am sure the two newest pairs will see me to ….well, I'll never retire so they better just get better with age. Always a good fit, Durable and will probably outlast me.

reviews.title: Great fit. Great pants!
reviews.review_text: I can wear these to work, going out to dinner, they look great and resist most all the dirt, food and grime I throw at them! Great value. I'm very satisfied.

reviews.title: Slim fit dickies
reviews.review_text: I bought four pairs of slim fit pants. Two of them lost their color right away. It was the navy blue and black ones. Other than they are a perfect fit.

reviews.title: Dickies slim work pants
reviews.review_text: Bought for my 91 yr old father for Christmas. They look very nice on him except they need hemmed which I knew when I bought them. He’s very pleased. Service was great!

reviews.title: Best work pants!
reviews.review_text: I'm a contractor for Time Warner Cable and have been wearing Dickies work pants for the last 6 years. They have the best fit and comfort. Very minimal wear and tear. They don't fade or shrink. I wouldn't wear anything else.

reviews.title: Great work pants!
reviews.review_text: I bought these in the past and I really like them. They stand up to the wear and tear of my custodial job and repeated washings. They fit and are comfortable. I plan to purchase more in the future.

reviews.title: stylish and comfortable
reviews.review_text: I love Dickies as a brand. They always have great pants that are durable and fit true to size, These slim fit are the perfect cut for me. I also enjoy that they look good enough for dressier or business occasion.

reviews.title: waist clip instead of button?
reviews.review_text: They fit tight.They replaced the "waist button" with a metal "clip" leaving the fly loose and sticking out at the front. Looks like I did not sip up my "fly" all the way, I don't like that.

reviews.title: Fits teens perfectly
reviews.review_text: I have trouble finding durable pants that fit my high school kids. They do a lot of skating and Dickies are the only pants that hold up. The slim fit pants are perfect and fit the thighs great.

reviews.title: GRAAT FIT!
reviews.review_text: I bought these to have a tighter fit around the legs and the were just what I was looking for. They only down side is that mine seem larger around the waist even though they are the same size as my 874's.

reviews.title: Bad Quality
reviews.review_text: Pants did not fit very well. I got 2 of the same size and they fit different from each other. One pair doesn't stay clipped. I bought Dickies for the quality but i am disappointed.

reviews.title: slim fit work pants
reviews.review_text: I'm a thin person but these pants were very tight and uncomfortable in the crotch area.I cannot imagine who these pants would fit comfortably. On the other hand, I got these pants replaced with 874's which I really like.

reviews.title: Very comfortable
reviews.review_text: I like these pants they are comfortable I have always had the ones with the cell phone pocket and hated how loose they were and how big the seat was these fit perfect

reviews.title: Lack of quality control
reviews.review_text: Quality control needs critical review. Left back pocket lining was folded and sewn into belt loop rendering it useless. To remove the stitching would be to undo the belt loop.

reviews.title: Fake left rear pocket
reviews.review_text: I realized too late that the left rear pocket on these pants is fake. I'm pretty sure it wouldn't cost more than another $.15 per pair to make it a real pocket, that's making it useful…

reviews.title: Hips are very low, and small pockets
reviews.review_text: Good quality, and well made as usual, but they ride really low on the hips. I had a couple pairs 7 or 8 years ago that didn't sit so low, but the updated style is very different. The pockets are quite small as well for being work pants

reviews.title: Great work pant
reviews.review_text: Pant material looks and feels like it will hold up to numerous washings. No binding regardless of position (kneeling, stooping, bending...etc.). Pant fit runs large though. Next purchase will be a smaller waist than I typically buy.

reviews.title: Excellent slim fit straight leg work pant
reviews.review_text: I bought dickies work pants before and loved how comfortable they were with deep pockets. I had to have more, so i bought 4 more pair very durable. Thank you for careing such a lovely product, i'm a firm beliver in your work pants.

reviews.title: Good work pant
reviews.review_text: I do like these work pants. However, if I had to do it again, I would have been the original fit. These pants look great, just the inseam is a little snug for work. All in all, the pants material is durable just a little too snug.

reviews.title: NOT what I expected
reviews.review_text: All of my pants are slim fit; this were not. The leg opening on this pants (hem area) is 9.25", they felt like bell bottoms. My other slim fit pants are 7.75" to 8" at the hem.

reviews.title: Dickies slim fit pants
reviews.review_text: On the baggy side and run on the small size. Terrific work pants for the price. They never ride up and can take a beating. I wear them every day at work and frequently at home also. Recommend

reviews.title: Best pant hands down
reviews.review_text: I have worn these style of pants since I was a boy. I love the durability and workmanship. If you want a pant that never lets you down and are comfortable dickies is the brand that lasts.

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.review_text: My son is really skinny and he's 6'3. It's tough finding pants that fit him. These are a perfect fit. The material is a bit rough and scratchy so I took off a star, but they look nice and wash well.

reviews.title: Doesn't fit right
reviews.review_text: I usually wear a size 28/29 waist but these pants were 2 sizes too small. The crotch area was also very tight and these pants are very low waist. The quality of the product is really great, it's very thick but stiff.

reviews.title: Slim size fits very well, not baggy.
reviews.review_text: My husband loves the pants, and so do I, except that they are so loose he can hardly keep them on. They are supposed to be 36 waist, but are much bigger than a 38 waist I bought a while back for him that were ordered to be a 36..

reviews.title: Great pants.
reviews.review_text: I bought these pants to complete a costume I was working on, and they are perfect. The color and fit are exactly as described, and the customer service was top notch.

reviews.title: great pair but..
reviews.review_text: I bought these and the fit is great, the only thing that I wish was better is the super low waist. The zipper is very short and I’d only wish for it to be a little bit more mid waist or even high-waisted

reviews.title: Questionable lengths
reviews.review_text: Good quality pants, but lengths are inaccurate. Ordered a 32” length expecting shrinkage. Washed in cold, air dry and the pants are floods on a kid who wears a 30” length. Disappointed.

reviews.title: Don't like the fit
reviews.review_text: I bought the pants approximately a month ago and I don't like the slim fit, not my kind of pants, if I would have known that I would have bought regular fit. I should have read the reviews but you don't know if they are true.

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.review_text: These should be called Modern Fit, it's really not that slim by other brand standards. Very happy with them, completely true to size. The belt loops are even larger then my older Original Fit pants and belts slip thru better. Great pants...

reviews.title: Awsome work/casual/dress pants
reviews.review_text: Pants are awesome they look good for casual wear, work wear and even dress up when you wanna look good but not overkill, all around 100% satisfied will be ordering more!

reviews.title: Amazing pants for skaters
reviews.review_text: I recently bought two pairs of 873 dickies and a pair of 874 original dickies they both feel amazing especially the 874 because it sits above your rather rather than below like the 873 both my favourite

reviews.title: Pants were good
reviews.review_text: I bought these two sizes bigger cause my pants were way too tight and were hurtinG, they were also dickies. But the new pants were way too big and even with a belt they were too big. I actually like the way the pants look and the way they feel.

reviews.title: Great Fit
reviews.review_text: I really like these...upset I can't find any Slim fit in my area...I am of a more short stature and I do wish there were a pant in a 36W 28in would relieve me of a great deal of suffering

reviews.title: Perfect fit
reviews.review_text: I had to guess on the fit because I couldn't find any stores locally that carried Slim Fit Straight Leg pants. I like the fit. Only thing better would be if they had the side leg pocket to carry my radio at work.

reviews.title: Not meant for men, painfully tight in crotch.
reviews.review_text: Extremely tight in the crotch. Painful to wear for an 8 hour work shift. Literally will not wear these again, it took two days for the discomfort after wearing these to subside.

reviews.title: Best Fit
reviews.review_text: The straight slim fit are the best fitting that you can buy for young slender men like I have. These are the only pants my boys wear and they last a long time. Great quality.

reviews.title: My teenage sons love this fit
reviews.review_text: My 15 and 17 yr old sons (who are very picky about their clothes) both think these pants are cool. They wear them cuffed. The pants soften up after washing which is great.

reviews.title: Fit was terrible
reviews.review_text: I bought these to skate in but the fit was horrendous. They’re the farthest thing from “slim” They fit more like those jnco jeans from the 90s-00s. These will be returned.

reviews.title: Available size
reviews.review_text: My husband wears Dickies everyday to work and this style fits nicely. Sadly I went back to order more pairs and they don't have his size in this style. I've tried all week to reorder.

reviews.title: Slim fit work pants
reviews.review_text: Amazing been wearing dickies for as long as I can remember. Always been impressed by the quality, the fit, and the durability of this company! Definitely a die hard customer !!!

reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Durable!
reviews.review_text: These pants fit great and wear like nails! I'm very thin and am happy that Dickies makes pants in a ‘slim fit' style. Every December, I order several pair and they hold up an entire year(6-7 day work weeks).

reviews.title: Love these pants!
reviews.review_text: I purchase these pants for my son to be worn as part of his school uniform. I like them because they do not have to be ironed! He is tall and thin and they fit him perfect! They are the only pants that he wears!

reviews.title: amazing pants
reviews.review_text: Bought these a while back for skating and they're extremely comfortable. Everything except for the crotch area which to me seems to be the most important. Especially for comfort. If it wasn't so high or tight, I'd give this rating 5 stars.

reviews.title: Great fit,
reviews.review_text: I bought these for my son who is going to auto mechanics school. He is on the slimmer side and it's hard to find pants that fit him in the waist and has length. These were perfect for his build.

reviews.title: Slim straight pants
reviews.review_text: My favorite pant! The cut is perfect with a waist slightly lower (more on the hips) than the 874 original fit. They're durable and they just look great!

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: The trouser fit is very good & properly sized. I would prefer more options on trouser length. I have to take the trousers, and the shorts too, to be altered. One negative is shipping. It takes a long time to get product out of your warehouse.

reviews.title: Momslaundry
reviews.review_text: We have tried many other brands of work pants and these are the ONLY ones that actually come clean from grease and oil. They wash and dry well and still look professional. No need to iron or professionally clean. Love them!

reviews.title: Sizing is off
reviews.review_text: The size says 30 waist but it is more of a 32 and for a slim fit that's the opposite direction it should be so either buy one size smaller or not at all

reviews.title: love the fit, I'm slim and 6-1 pants look taylored
reviews.review_text: best looking pants for work i have ever owned. need to look at pocket design ever time I set down everything rolls out of my pockets. deeper maybe

reviews.title: Excellent quality
reviews.review_text: I'm a field service tech. I'm in and out of my car all day. I was looking for a pair of pants that are comfortable and tough. I was wearing docker's. These are by far a better choice.

reviews.title: I like’m
reviews.review_text: Pretty much my go to pants for work, skateboarding, chillin or whatever. I’m pretty skinny and these fit better to me than other dickies that are slim fit. Wish they came in other colors. For the price, good all around pants

reviews.title: GREAT FIT!!
reviews.review_text: Bought 2 pairs for my Son. He loves the fit. He's very picky about his pants so glad we finally found some that he likes. We will be buying these for awhile.

reviews.title: Best fit
reviews.review_text: Bought these because I wanted a better fitting pant. And this was the right choice. Not too tight not lose and very comfortable and easy to move around in. Big fan of dickies work pants and love these slim fit pants.

reviews.title: Great quality work pants
reviews.review_text: I always use dickie pants for work they last a long time but they happened to shrink so I would recommend to buy a size longer I've noticed after a few washes they tend to shrink a bit and the colors do Fade slightly especially the black ones.

reviews.title: Great work pants at a great price
reviews.review_text: I ordered slim fit navy. The fit and the color were exactly right. These are sturdy pants for EMT work without being too binding. Excellent price too.

reviews.title: Look Great, durable! But...
reviews.review_text: Im a 32x30 and the slim straight are too tight from the crotch area, maybe they'd feel better going a number longer but thats not my size. This doesn't happen with regular fit dickies.

reviews.title: My husband loves them!
reviews.review_text: These fit perfectly on my husband! He's 140lbs and 5' 7" with a slim build. We got them in 32/30 in navy and tan and they look great! They came on time and not damaged!

reviews.title: Best of the Best
reviews.review_text: Stiff at first but in a good way, after they run through the wash once or twice they really feel great. The look is great and they really conform to your body. The fabric is beyond durable and will last you very long.

reviews.title: Great fit
reviews.review_text: Great fit in legs. Seam on the butt is a little tight but stretches out. Wouldn’t really consider it slim in comparison to other pants but is a great change up from the usual 874.

reviews.title: I love dickies vintage pants
reviews.review_text: I wish these were a pair of the 1922 vintage Dickies pants but they're not so they gonna have to do, don't get me wrong I do love dickies but 1922 material and hardware is just amazing

reviews.title: Fit issues
reviews.review_text: The blue slim fit (873) pants fit a lot tighter than the grey and khaki colors...they are unwearable. The waist fits right but in the upper legs and pelvic area they are very tight and uncomfortable. I would like to exchange them for the 874's

reviews.title: Deep sky slim fit straight leg
reviews.review_text: Fit as expected. I prefer these over other models. I chose a different color this time, and boy does the "deep sky" pop! Website pictures don't quite show how bright this color actually is...

reviews.title: Great Uniform Pants
reviews.review_text: I bought these for my son's school uniform. They are perfect uniform pants given the sturdy material, solid navy blue color, and overall pants structure. Also, a great fit for his naturally slim build.

reviews.title: Tough
reviews.review_text: I like them, but when I'm sitting at work, they ride up and I don't have enough space in the front. I also miss the riveted button on the front instead of the metal slide fastener. This one comes undone under my belt.

reviews.title: Pants
reviews.review_text: Love the fit of the pants ! How ever didn't appreciate that they were thrown in my mailbox !! No package ! Just the pants grown in !! My mailbox is dirty!

reviews.title: Nice Work Pants
reviews.review_text: I have been buying these for a couple of years now. I like the way they fit, especially since I have worked my butt off! Seriously, no butt. These work well for that. Jeans just don't look right. You will like these.

reviews.title: Dickies slim straight
reviews.review_text: I bought this style about 6 months ago and it for great! Bought the same style / size again in 2 new colors a couple weeks ago and they fit totally different. The rises were shorter by about and inch and waist and thigh were tight.

reviews.title: I wasn’t expecting that style
reviews.review_text: I got 2 pairs on black friday and I thought they were going to be slimmer thats why I got them but they were only slimmer on the thighs but this could be bad on my fault because I ordered on impulse thinking they were just slim

reviews.title: Best on market
reviews.review_text: These pants are the best quality on the market. Durable, keeps its color Very flexible with a stylish look very professional. Would you use no other Thank you Dickies

reviews.title: size up
reviews.review_text: pant material is great but the waist/hip fit is much smaller than anticipated. I usually wear a 30, but ordered a 31 and it fits quite a bit smaller than expected.

reviews.title: Great Pants
reviews.review_text: Looks great as either work or casual wear, pulls out of the drier relatively wrinkle free, and does fit more snug obviously than the original 874 pants; the waistline site lower than the original 874s.

reviews.title: New slim fit straight leg best ever
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing dickies to work in for a long time. The new slim fit is just 1 notch better than the regular work pants. They fit great & will last a long time. (Dear dickies; just add a button & they will be flawless)

reviews.title: Second to none!
reviews.review_text: I only weigh about 160 lbs, and can fit in the leg of most work pants. With the Dickies quality their a genuine buy! Which is hard to find these days. Will buy again.

reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
reviews.review_text: These pants are great! They fit almost perfect for a taller slimmer figure. The only issues I encountered were groin tightness as well as the clasp in place of a button. When bending over the clasp can often come undone.

reviews.title: Great pants except for the fuzz
reviews.review_text: Great fit and durable fabric, but the fabric developed “pilling” or sort of a fuzz on it after only a few weeks for wear and washing. I wear these in a business casual office environment because they're cheap, look good, and fit well. They'd be perfect if it weren't for the fuzz.

reviews.title: Don't Like "SLIM"? Go Buy the Regular 874
reviews.review_text: For everyone saying these are too small and fit terrible you must not be reading the description. They are "SLIM" fit. If you don't want a short rise and "SLIM" fit go buy the regular 874. I'm 6'2" and weigh 175lbs. These pants fit perfect. Regular 874 are too big and baggy for me and don't fit my body type at all. @Dickies please don't change the fit on these. It's so hard to find "SLIM" work pants that fit well

reviews.title: Great alternative to 874's.
reviews.review_text: Very happy with these 873's. If you are used to the classic 874's these fit very similarly, but with a slimmer leg profile. The main difference is that the waist is lower. I wear 32 waist in my 874's, but 32 waist in my 873's is too loose (hence 4 stars). Other reviewers say to size up, but if you're pretty thin, consider going a size down. The length and construction is consistent with the 874's. I agree with the fact that they should make more colors in the 873's, especially Lincoln Green.

reviews.title: Dickies Work Pants - slim cut
reviews.review_text: Had to return the work pants because the zipper is only 3 inches long. That is way to short for a man. They need to be at least 5 inches long, otherwise a man would have to take his pants off just to urinate. We checked all of my husband's other pants and the zippers are at least 5 inches long. If you made them with longer zippers, we would buy them again. The material is so durable and easy to keep clean. My husband was a former insurance adjuster and these pants were part of his uniform.

reviews.title: Great Company
reviews.review_text: I love Dickies, my whole family have been a customer for a very long time

reviews.review_text: Purchased these pants for work and they're exactly as good as the ones previously purchased. Never lets me down.

reviews.review_text: The slim are pretty tight in the butt area. Almost wedgie like and I'm not a very big dude. Other than that they are great.

reviews.review_text: My son works in a metal fabrication shop and Dickies quality pants never disappoint! He only wears Dickies pants and shorts, even when not at work!

reviews.review_text: I have men ask me about once a month where I got them. I think they remind them of their military dress khakis

reviews.title: Best cut of Dickies pants I've ever bought!

reviews.review_text: I am a long standing lover of Dickies Clothing. I wear your clothing for leisure and preserve them very well.
